tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE comedy_podcast_data (
    episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_title VARCHAR(255),
    release_date DATE,
    downloads INT,
    listener_demographic VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE comedy_podcast_network (episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
episode_title VARCHAR(255),
downloads INT,
listener_demographics JSONB)

CREATE TABLE listener_demographics (listener_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
age INT,
location VARCHAR(255),
interests JSONB)

CREATE TABLE episode_stats (episode_id INT REFERENCES comedy_podcast_network(episode_id),
total_downloads INT,
total_listeners INT,
average_listen_duration INTERVAL)

CREATE TABLE podcast_hosts (host_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
host_name VARCHAR(255),
host_bio TEXT)

CREATE TABLE episodes (
  episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  episode_title VARCHAR(255),
  release_date DATE,
  duration_minutes INT,
  download_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE listeners (
  listener_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  listener_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE listeners_episodes (
  listener_id INT,
  episode_id INT,
  download_date DATE,
  listening_duration_minutes INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (listener_id) REFERENCES listeners(listener_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (episode_id) REFERENCES episodes(episode_id)
)

CREATE TABLE podcasts (
  podcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  podcast_title VARCHAR(255),
  host_name VARCHAR(100),
  category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE podcast_episodes (
  episode_id INT,
  podcast_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (episode_id) REFERENCES episodes(episode_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (podcast_id) REFERENCES podcasts(podcast_id)
)
